TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_suru_qmisan, title = suru_qmisan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/suru_qmisan} }

S.FORM: suru qmisan 'bagan ga, ini' suru qmisan ana nanu' qsinu qu Tayal.
soro qmisan 'bagan ga, ini' soro qmisan ana nano' qsino qo Tayal.
